stories.headline: A scramble to assess the dangers of President-elect Donald Trumpâ€™s global business empire

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president of Trump Toronto Hotel Management Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned 2273297 in management fees & other contract payments income from TRUMP TORONTO HOTEL MANAGEMENT CORP, valued at $1,001 - $15,000. Value reported reflects bank account holding only. Additional Underlying Asset: management deal with TALON INTERNATIONAL INC - value not readily ascertainable. Management company, New York, NY; See attached schedule.
